Qubell Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2013-09-03  | Version: 1.0-SNAPSHOT
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
  • Usage

Project Documentation

  • Project Reports

qubell:test-connection

Full name:

com.qubell.maven:qubell-maven-plugin:1.0-SNAPSHOT:test-connection

Description:

Verfies connection settings by attempting to get list of Qubell organizations for user account

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
apiURL URL - Base URL for Qubell API including API version
example: https://express.qubell.com/
User property is: apiURL.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
apiPassword String - API password This value gets overridden if qubell.global.server pointing to valid server entry in global/user settings
User property is: apiPassword.
apiUsername String - Username for API
Note: cannot be OpenID username (such as Google account) This value gets overridden if qubell.global.server pointing to valid server entry in global/user settings
User property is: apiUsername.
bypassSSLCheck Boolean - Whether SSL certificate check has to be bypassed. Use this option for self-signed certificates.
Default value is: false.
User property is: bypassSSLCheck.
logApiPayload Boolean - If set to true, API request/response pairs will be logged into standard out
Default value is: false.
User property is: logApiPayload.
mojoExecution MojoExecution - Current plugin MOJO execution information
Default value is: ${mojoExecution}.
outputRelativePath String - Path for file where instance output parametersJson will be saved
User property is: outputRelativePath.
parameters TreeMap - Custom parameters in XML format Example <paramName>paramValue</paramName> <nestedParam> <subKey>subValue</subKey> </nestedParam>
User property is: parameters.
parametersJson String - Custom parameters for the execution, represents a raw JSON map. If supplied, overrides XML parameters Example { "paramName" : "paramValue" }
User property is: parametersJson.
project MavenProject - Current maven project, used to store values between MOJOs
Default value is: ${project}.
retryAttempts Integer - Number of attempts for retrying API call when service is busy or unavailable
Default value is: 5.
User property is: retryAttempts.
retryTimeout Integer - Timeout (in seconds) for retrying API call when service is busy or unavailable
Default value is: 10.
User property is: retryTimeout.
serverId String - (no description)
Default value is: ${qubell.global.server}.
session MavenSession - (no description)
Default value is: ${session}.
settings Settings - Maven settings
Default value is: ${settings}.
statusPollingInterval Integer - Interval for instance status polling. Value is specified in seconds.
Default value is: 5.
User property is: statusPollingInterval.
statusWaitTimeout Integer - Wait timeout for instance, turning into target status
Default value is: 60.
User property is: statusWaitTimeout.

Parameter Details

apiPassword:

API password This value gets overridden if qubell.global.server pointing to valid server entry in global/user settings
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: apiPassword

apiURL:

Base URL for Qubell API including API version
example: https://express.qubell.com/
  • Type: java.net.URL
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: apiURL

apiUsername:

Username for API
Note: cannot be OpenID username (such as Google account) This value gets overridden if qubell.global.server pointing to valid server entry in global/user settings
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: apiUsername

bypassSSLCheck:

Whether SSL certificate check has to be bypassed. Use this option for self-signed certificates.
  • Type: java.lang.Boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: bypassSSLCheck
  • Default: false

logApiPayload:

If set to true, API request/response pairs will be logged into standard out
  • Type: java.lang.Boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: logApiPayload
  • Default: false

mojoExecution:

Current plugin MOJO execution information
  • Type: org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecution
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${mojoExecution}

outputRelativePath:

Path for file where instance output parametersJson will be saved
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: outputRelativePath

parameters:

Custom parameters in XML format Example <paramName>paramValue</paramName> <nestedParam> <subKey>subValue</subKey> </nestedParam>
  • Type: java.util.TreeMap
  • Required: No
  • User Property: parameters

parametersJson:

Custom parameters for the execution, represents a raw JSON map. If supplied, overrides XML parameters Example { "paramName" : "paramValue" }
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: parametersJson

project:

Current maven project, used to store values between MOJOs
  • Type: org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project}

retryAttempts:

Number of attempts for retrying API call when service is busy or unavailable
  • Type: java.lang.Integer
  • Required: No
  • User Property: retryAttempts
  • Default: 5

retryTimeout:

Timeout (in seconds) for retrying API call when service is busy or unavailable
  • Type: java.lang.Integer
  • Required: No
  • User Property: retryTimeout
  • Default: 10

serverId:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${qubell.global.server}

session:

(no description)
  • Type: org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${session}

settings:

Maven settings
  • Type: org.apache.maven.settings.Settings
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${settings}

statusPollingInterval:

Interval for instance status polling. Value is specified in seconds.
  • Type: java.lang.Integer
  • Required: No
  • User Property: statusPollingInterval
  • Default: 5

statusWaitTimeout:

Wait timeout for instance, turning into target status
  • Type: java.lang.Integer
  • Required: No
  • User Property: statusWaitTimeout
  • Default: 60
